book.title: Frank and Fearless or The Fortunes of Jasper Kent
book.description: 简介： A dozen boys were playing ball in a field adjoining the boarding-school of Dr. Pericles Benton, in the town of Walltham, a hundred and twenty-five miles northeast of the city of New York. These boys varied in age from thirteen to seventeen. In anothe...
